DLG ITM_0
You found the {clr3}Library Key{clr3}!

DLG ITM_1
You found the {clr3}Tuna Can{clr3}!

DLG ITM_2
You found the {clr3}Can Opener{clr3}!

DLG ITM_3
You found the {clr3}Sinister Eye of Foreboding{clr3}!

DLG SPR_2
It's locked!

DLG SPR_3
It's a statue of a door, and it's missing an eye!

DLG ITM_4
"""
{
  - {item "Bullet"} >= 1 ?
    You shot the zombie.
  - {item "Bullet"} == 0 ?
    You died.
}
"""

DLG SPR_4
This was recently lit..

DLG SPR_5
It's locked from the other side!

DLG SPR_1
"""
{
  - {item "0"} == 1 ?
    You used the {clr3}Library Key{clr3}! delete fruits.fruit2;
  - else ?
    "Library"
    It's locked.
}
"""

DLG ITM_5
You picked up a {clr3}BULLET{clr3}!

DLG ITM_6
"""
{
  - {item "BobbyPin"} == 1 ?
    {shk}{clr3}BOO!!{clr3}{shk}
}
"""

DLG ITM_7
You found a {clr3}{shk}Bobby Pin{shk}{clr3}!

DLG ITM_8
"""
{
  - {item "BobbyPin"} == 1 ?
    {shk}{clr3}BOO!!{clr3}{shk}
  - else ?

}
"""

DLG ITM_9
"""
Crumpled note:
"STAY AWAY FROM THE WINDOWS"
"""

DLG SPR_0
"""
{
  - {item "Bullet"} == 1 ?
    You shot the kitty.
  - else ?
    Mreow!
}
"""

END 0
Jumpscare1
